## Summary

Describe the change and why it is needed.

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] CI / infra change
- [ ] Docs

## Checklist
- [ ] I have read the contribution guidelines.
- [ ] CI checks (build, Trivy, Sonar) are green.
- [ ] Images are signed (if applicable) and Trivy scan passed.

If this is an infra change (Terraform), ensure the `Bootstrap Terraform Backend` has been run if the backend does not exist.
